page.shortlink: api client api a5 u array match method

argument.name: array
argument.description: The array to match the item in.

argument.name: item
argument.description: The item to match in the array.

argument.name: start
argument.description: The index on the array to start matching from. A negative value will be offset from the end of the array with "-1" being the last index.

page.description: Get the first index an item that matches the passed in item.
